Module qilletni.api
Package is.yarr.qilletni.api.lib.qll

Class ComparableVersion

java.lang.Object
is.yarr.qilletni.api.lib.qll.Version
is.yarr.qilletni.api.lib.qll.ComparableVersion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<ComparableVersion>
public class ComparableVersion extends Version implements Comparable<ComparableVersion>
A Version that may be compared with others, fitting a range.

    ComparableVersion.RangeSpecifier
    Specifies how a version may be matched with other versions.

    • ComparableVersion

      public ComparableVersion(int major, int minor, int patch, ComparableVersion.RangeSpecifier rangeSpecifier)
      Creates a new ComparableVersion with the given major, minor, and patch versions, and a range specifier.
      Parameters:
      major - The major version
      minor - The minor version
      patch - The patch version
      rangeSpecifier - The range specifier for the version

    • ComparableVersion

      public ComparableVersion(Version version, ComparableVersion.RangeSpecifier rangeSpecifier)
      Creates a new ComparableVersion with the given Version and range specifier.
      Parameters:
      version - The version to use, specifying the major, minor, and patch versions
      rangeSpecifier - The range specifier for the version

  • Method Details

    • parseComparableVersionString

      public static Optional<ComparableVersion> parseComparableVersionString(String versionString)
      Parses a ComparableVersion from a string, such as ^1.0.0. If the version doesn't contain a range specifier, then ComparableVersion.RangeSpecifier.EXACT is set.
      Parameters:
      versionString - The version string to parse
      Returns:
      The created ComparableVersion, if the string was valid

    • permitsVersion

      public boolean permitsVersion(Version checkVersion)
      Checks if the current ComparableVersion permits the given Version to be used in the current range.
      Parameters:
      checkVersion - The version to compare
      Returns:
      If the version fits the bounds of the current ComparableVersion.RangeSpecifier

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(ComparableVersion other)
      Comparable method to allow comparison between versions using java Comparables
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<ComparableVersion>
      Parameters:
      other - the ComparableVersion to be compared.
      Returns:
      the compare value between this version and the other ComparableVersion
